name: Just Don,t Rise or Fall demo
name_original: Just Don,t Rise or Fall demo
description:
This game made by Omar Mahmoud Kamil.

Controls arrow keys to move.

Just don,t rise or fall is an endless game that talk about try to not  let the platforms rise you up or fall to the bottom. (this is not the full version of the game and i will upgrade it in the future)

to download on windows:

1:Click download

2:Right click on JUST DONT RISE OR FALL.ZIP

3:Click extract all

4:After it downloads open Just Don,t Rise or Fall folder

5:Click app data folder

6:Click Just Don,t Rise or Fall.exe and have fun
